scripts.build: ./version.sh && tsc && chmod +x ./dist/webez.js && rm -rf ./dist/scaffold && cp -r ./scaffold ./dist && rm -rf ./dist/component-scaffold && mkdir ./dist/component-scaffold && cp -r ./component-scaffold ./dist && rm -rf ./dist/dialog-scaffold && mkdir ./dist/dialog-scaffold && cp -r ./dialog-scaffold ./dist && cp ./package.json ./dist
